about.title: About us
about.p1: We are Hannes and Stefán, two partners from Verzlunarskólinn who share a passion for design, entrepreneurship and technology.
about.p2: After working together on numerous projects over recent years, we decided to start Vefstæðið – our first own business – alongside our studies in industrial engineering at Reykjavik University.
about.p3: Our goal is to design professional and fast websites that look good, deliver results and simplify the operations of our clients. Whether you're starting a business or want to take your current website to the next level, we ensure the process is fast, professional and hassle-free.

faq.q: How do payments work and when do I need to pay?
faq.a: We accept payments via bank transfer or card. Monthly subscription is paid in advance each month, while annual subscription is paid in full at the beginning. No hidden fees.

faq.q: How do you build the websites?
faq.a: It depends on the project needs. For simple sites we use HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Tailwind for speed and efficiency. For more complex functionality like logins, payments or databases we use Next.js and React. All websites are designed from scratch with speed and SEO in mind, hosted on Netlify with SSL and CDN.

faq.q: Do I need to update the website myself?
faq.a: No! We handle all updates for you — it's included in the subscription. Whether it's content changes, images, text or technical updates, you just send us a message and we take action.

faq.q: What if I want to cancel the subscription?
faq.a: No long-term commitment. You can cancel the subscription at any time with 30 days notice. The website stays live for an additional 30 days so you have time to find another solution if needed.
